attributes.additional_details: I Live in a small but very diverse town called Luton. Being born in Luton some things are traditional, Christmas being one of them. Regardless of the multi-culteral diversety of Luton some things should be preserved, Christmas being one of them. In the last few days I have learnt that the Christmas Tree and Lights within Luton is unethical and will not happen this year. We being English people are not allowed to hang English flags out of our windows, during World Cup matches and celebrate Christmas. I personaly aswell as many others find this racist. Which is where my e-petiton begins...
